title: Int’l community assistance for Afghanistan imperative to avert humanitarian crisis: COAS
content:
RAWALPINDI, Jan 7 (APP): British High Commissioner Christian Turner Friday called on Chief of Army Staff (COAS) General Qamar Javed Bajwa at General Headquarters (GHQ).
During the meeting, matters of mutual interest, regional security situation including Afghanistan and bilateral cooperation in various fields were discussed, said an Inter Services Public Relations (ISPR) media release.
On the occasion, the Army Chief said, “It’s imperative for regional peace and stability that international community assist Afghanistan to avert humanitarian crisis.”
The visiting dignitary appreciated Pakistan’s efforts for regional peace particularly in Afghan situation.
